name: docking_autodock_vina
description: Performs docking using AutoDock Vina with specified parameters

inputs.name: smiles_list
inputs.description: List of SMILES strings for ligands to dock

inputs.name: receptor_pdb_file
inputs.description: Path to the receptor PDB file

inputs.name: box_center
inputs.description: Center coordinates of the docking box [x, y, z]

inputs.name: box_size
inputs.description: Size of the docking box [x, y, z]
